description: Uses AI (Google Gemini, OpenAI, or LocalAI) to analyze movie metadata and automatically add audience target tags (kids, teens, adults). Considers target audience rather than just content ratings.
name: Auto Parental Tags
overview: Automatically tag movies with target audience using AI
